CEO title at Google to cofounder Larry Page NEW YORK( CNNMoney)-- Google CEO Eric Schmidt will step down from his role as Google's CEO in April and be replaced by co-founder Larry Page. We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time, Eric Schmidt said in a prepared statement.`` By clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company.'' He was asked whether he envisioned being compared to Brown while playing at the University of Texas.`` Everybody put me in the class with Earl Campbell ,'' Jamaal Charles said, and now I'm in a class with Jim Brown. Amazing. Jamaal Charles was chosen for the FedEx Award over Houston's Arian Foster , the NFL's leading rusher with 1,616 yards and a 4.9-yard average, and Atlanta's Michael Vick Turner, the third-leading rusher with 1,371 yards.
